data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The basic operation of a telephone involves sound waves being converted into electrical signals. These ____ can ____ be ____ over ____ distances ____ a ____ transmitting ____ signals ____ one ____ to a device ____ them ____ another. The ____ telephone ____ involved ____ connections ____ two ____ or ____. However, this was rapidly changed to a more flexible system where a central office would direct calls towards an intended receiver.
data.partBlankContent: The basic operation of a telephone involves sound waves being converted into electrical signals. These sig____ can th__ be se__ over lo__ distances fr__ a dev___ transmitting th___ signals a_ one e__ to a device rece_____ them a_ another. The orig____ telephone sys___ involved dir___ connections bet____ two loca_____ or par____. However, this was rapidly changed to a more flexible system where a central office would direct calls towards an intended receiver.
data.answer: 电话的基本操作包括把声波转换成电信号。这些信号从一端发送到另一端接收的设备，可以在很远的距离上看到。最初的电话系统涉及两个地点或双方之间的直接连接。然而，这很快就变成了一种更灵活的系统，由中央办公室将呼叫导向预定的接收者。
